regen.absent_element: report creation mechanism for incorporating PDF files into reports
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a mechanism to incorporate existing PDF files into newly created reports.

regen.absent_element: incorporation of PDF files into reports
regen.new_specification: The system shall incorporate PDF files into generated reports.
The system shall provide the ability to review reports that have been saved as PDF files.

label: The system shall provide the ability to incorporate PDF files into standard Pontis reports.
absence: action of incorporating PDF files into standard reports
